lesson.title: Verifiable Identity in Web3
lesson.objective: Link social identity for reputation and recovery

sections.content: While wallet addresses are pseudonymous, linking a verifiable identity adds layers of utility. ENS names (yourname.eth) make addresses human-readable. Farcaster creates social reputation.

Identity links also enable social recovery - if you lose access to one account, your connected identities can help verify you're the rightful owner. It's building a web of trust without centralized authorities.

content: ENS names are NFTs that resolve to wallet addresses
Farcaster is a decentralized social protocol
Multiple identity links increase recovery options

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of linking an ENS name?
How does identity linking help with security?
